details.title: Periodic orbits on af-symplectic manifolds
details.abstract: The method by McDuffis used to get the existence of the J-holomorphic sphere in some sympectic Manifolds and then the J-holomorphic sphere is perturbed to split a periodic solution of Hamiltonian systems in these sympletic manifolds. As a result, the Weinstein conjecture is proved in the asymptotically manifolds.
